data.name: Covid-19 in Germany - making the right decisions now
data.summary: KPMG Germany and its International Business team wish to support international groups with bases in Germany in making and taking the right decisions during these uncertain and economically complex times. As a result and based upon our far reaching experience we have put together insights of and solutions for the most pressing issues currently facing you. These will be showcased in a live webcast offered on two alternative dates.
